Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Southbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, St. Lawrence, South Chicago and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, St. Lawrence, South Chicago and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/St. Lawrence.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
